node.title: 'We are back!': Luna Rossa confirm return for next America's Cup
node.description: The Italians will return to challenge again for the 'Auld Mug'.
node.content: ["Luna Rossa have confirmed their entry for the next America's Cup in 2024.", "On Friday, the Italian syndicate announced its challenge had been accepted and they would be among the boats vying for a chance to take on holders Team New Zealand for the Auld Mug.", "\"The Royal New Zealand Yacht Squadron has formally accepted Circolo della Vela Sicilia and Luna Rossa Team Notice of Challenge lodged on December 1st, 2021,\" they said in an Instagram post.", "\"Stay tuned..\"", "The announcement comes two days after Swiss boat Alinghi confirmed it will return from an 11-year absence for the 37th edition of the oldest trophy in sports.", "More to come"]
